# tama_queue (Resource)

Manages a Tama System Queue resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `concurrency` (Number) Maximum concurrent thoughts dispatched to the queue
- `name` (String) Name of the queue
- `role` (String) Role handled by the queue (e.g., oracle, planner)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Queue identifier
